meanings.definition: A device used to secure or hold things together.
meanings.sent1: The fastener on the jacket kept it closed.
meanings.sent2: She used a fastener to attach the papers together.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the fastener to prank its friends.
meanings.sent4: His smile was the fastener that held the team together.
meanings.sent5: The fastener clicked into place, sealing the box securely.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that fastens.
meanings.sent1: The skilled tailor was a fastener in the fashion show.
meanings.sent2: The fastener quickly fixed the broken zipper.
meanings.sent3: The fastener at the party made sure everyone danced together.
meanings.sent4: Her words were the fastener that brought the family closer.
meanings.sent5: The fastener's hands worked swiftly to tie the knots.
